entry.title: Looking at AI to facilitate espionage

link.title: Looking at AI to facilitate espionage

entry.content: I am going to be looking at the article where KnowBe4 hired a North Korean. The threat actor tricked them to hire them, because they used AI to change their appearance for pictures, and on video call.
entry.summary: I am going to be looking at the article where KnowBe4 hired a North Korean. The threat actor tricked them to hire them, because they used AI to change their appearance for pictures, and on video call.
